resources.string: You need to set a title
Action to do when the alarm is done

To start your routine,
load a saved routin by clicking on the left button
load the activities of the day by clicking on the right button
Then, click on the Start button.
You can change the order of the activities by clicking on the + and - buttons on the right of each activity.
If you have changed an activity on the activities page, press the refresh button above to reload all the activities.
Press the button ? for showing/hiding this help.

Click the button below for adding activity
If you have changed an activity on the activities page, you may have to press the refresh button above to reload all the activities.
Press the button ? for showing/hiding this help.

Click the button below for adding a routine (group of activities)
If you have changed an activity on the activities page, you may have to press the refresh button above to reload all the activities.
Press the button ? for showing/hiding this help.

This application has been developed to help you get things done on time
and to help you create routines so that you won\'t have to struggle every morning to get ready.
To get started, go to the activities\'panel and start by creating activities by clicking on the button at the bottom of the application.

Then, go to the routines\'panel. Create one by clicking on the button at the bottom, specify a title. Open the routine created, you can add, delete or change position of your activites. Save the routine.
Go to the home panel ab click on the routines\'button to load one of the routine. When you see the activities on the panel, you can press play to start your routine.
You can personnalize the background of the countdown by editing your activities. You can also switch between the coutdown and the time by clicking on the title, at the top of your application.

Long press on the center button to start the next activity, use the bottom-left button to snooze. If you don\'t do anything, the next activity will be started or the current activity will be snoozed for the time given in the activity, depending on what you choose in the settings.
Welcome to AlwaysOnTime, this application is here to help you manage your time efficiently. Let us show you a little help to get started ith your new application.
